Convert raw vector(s) into hexadecimal character string(s)

Source: R/wkb.R
rawToHex.Rd

Convert raw vector(s) into hexadecimal character string(s)

Usage

rawToHex(x)

Arguments

x

raw vector, or list with raw vectors
